storyInfo: The Viscount returns to the barracks, and after chatting with his troops, he decides to attempt to complete the Duke's mission. An old devotee brings Leto to the Paleroche clan, revealing that he is Arctosz's father. In a dusty room, that devotee recalls regretful memories.

attributes.content: Full house!
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: Straight flush!
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: You little sack of shite, you've been hiding cards, haven't ya?
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: Why'd I need to hide cards to beat you? Just sit yourself down like a good boy—
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: Royal flush.
attributes.name: Silent Soldier

attributes.content: Goddammit, how'd you pull that one off?!
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: Your sleeve, Jack.
attributes.name: Silent Soldier

attributes.content: Eh? My—How'd you catch that?
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: Jack, you cheating bastard!
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: Hey, if you didn't catch me, that's your problem.
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: You want a problem? I'll shove your goddamn head so far up your arse that—
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: Just shuffle already.
attributes.name: Silent Soldier

attributes.content: Alright, shuffling, shuffling.
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: I've sure got some rotten luck, getting stuck with you sorry lot for this shift.
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: Doesn't matter who you're on shift with, you're playing cards anyway. And there's only a handful of fellas here who won't try to cheat you. Go on, have a count.
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: At least there hasn't been much to do today.
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: You can say that again. Back when the old man said he'd take us sightseeing, I didn't believe him for one second.
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: Now that it's been a month, I'd say I believe him.
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: It's been good eating and good drinking.
attributes.name: Silent Soldier

attributes.content: Certainly has! It feels like my appetite's gone back to when I just enlisted.
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: Ahhh!!!
attributes.name: Sickly Soldier

attributes.content: What the hell are you screaming out for, Charles?! Scared the crap outta me!
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: Bloody hell, I had another nightmare.
attributes.name: Sickly Soldier

attributes.content: Dreamt that I got chopped in half by a Sarkaz sword and all.
attributes.name: Sickly Soldier

attributes.content: Gah, thought it'd be something worse. Day afore yesterday I dreamt that I got blown up by some Originium explosives while out scouting.
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: Right now I'd like to shove some explosives into your gob.
attributes.name: Sickly Soldier

attributes.content: Well hurry up already then.
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: A guy nuttier than a freaking Vampire out on the battlefield is going to have a few screws loose when off the warfront.
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: Well, what can I do? I can't control if I have a nightmare or not.
attributes.name: Sickly Soldier

attributes.content: Just think positive. Last time you said you were being minced, this time you said you were being chopped in two.
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: Maybe it's a good omen or something.
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: Dammit, you're right.
attributes.name: Sickly Soldier

attributes.content: Alright, enough moping, grab a drink and come play some cards.
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: Perfect timing really. Now that you're up, come take over my spot for a few rounds.
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: Why, is something the matter?
attributes.name: Sickly Soldier

attributes.content: Not really. There's a few farmers at the bottom of the mountain that need a hand with their work, so I'm going to help out.
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: Farmers?
attributes.name: Sickly Soldier

attributes.content: That family that gives us milk all the time, the Turiels.
attributes.name: Silent Soldier

attributes.content: Oh, I remember them. Their daughter's quite pretty.
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: Heh, I see how it is, Lisburn.
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: I'm just helping out. Don't read too much into it.
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: The hell are you lot doing? Everyone within a hundred meters could hear you yapping away.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: You sure have some skills, turning the barracks into your gambling parlor.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Didn't you say we were going to go sightseeing from the start, though?
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: We're just following orders here.
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: I told you, you can go help out the locals a bit for some goodwill, let them think we're more than just a bunch of yobs. Have you been yet?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Lisburn's going to help out. He's keeping mum, but I can tell that he's thinking of settling down here.
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Don't listen to this nutter, boss. I really am just going there to help out.
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: After all, we came here to...
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: Alright, that's enough out of you.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Just get going already. Who died and made you chief worrywart, huh?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: If a young lad like yourself really does want to become a family man, I'd say you're still a good egg.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Yes, sir!
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: You've sure got a stink about you, boss.
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: Still working on your veterinary medicine out there?
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: Save it. Lily, the Leones' girl, she gave birth prematurely.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Didn't get there in time, all I could do was help with some postpartum care.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: *sigh* And then I ran into this one very unlucky chap.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Unlucky?
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: Another Victorian.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: A Victorian? The whole month we've been here I bet I've seen, if not a thousand Victorian tourists, eight hundred at least.
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: Alright, I get it, you love taking a stroll down the street.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Deal those cards out already.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I'll deal.
attributes.name: Silent Soldier

attributes.content: Charles had a nightmare again, boss.
attributes.name: Silent Soldier

attributes.content: Did he?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Let me see.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: It's fine, no use troubling yourself over it.
attributes.name: Sickly Soldier

attributes.content: If you lot die, then who's going to fight for me?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: We're going to fight?
attributes.name: Sickly Soldier

attributes.content: Shut your mouth for a second and hold still, alright?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Gah—
attributes.name: Sickly Soldier

attributes.content: Hmm... Well, at least it hasn't gotten worse.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Does it still hurt as much as last time?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: It's been a lot better since we came to Kjerag.
attributes.name: Sickly Soldier

attributes.content: Hmph, I spent a lot of money greasing palms just to get this opportunity. If you lot aren't feeling any healthier, doesn't it seem like I wasted all that dosh for nothing?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Besides, it's not like there's anything else to do here except get better.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Heh, you're right about that, sir.
attributes.name: Sickly Soldier

attributes.content: This arm's been no good for a while, but you've already helped me a lot.
attributes.name: Sickly Soldier

attributes.content: If I ever lose both my arms, well, at least I can still carry a weapon into battle with my teeth.
attributes.name: Sickly Soldier

attributes.content: What use is a soldier with no arms?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: There's no need to show off. You lads just need to remember that you're here to—
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Allow me to remind you once more, My Lord.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: You have a duty you are obligated to carry out. Do not fail Her Grace.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: This is not a sightseeing trip.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Hey, boss?
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: You finally gone senile?
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: I'm not the same as you simpletons who care nothing for your health.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: When you've gone senile, I'm still going to be fit as a fiddle.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Hey, we might not even get to live that long.
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: *sigh*
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Forget it.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: For the sake of my retirement, this old fogey's willing to go all in.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: What are you talking about?
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: I don't think a hoity-toity lord like you throwing your money around is going to fit in well with the locals, honestly.
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: But nobody's going to turn down a sumptuous banquet.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: You go on and play your cards.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Sure you're not just looking for an excuse to drop a crappy hand?
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: Let me see...
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: Four Jacks, not great, not terrible.
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: Hah! Now that hits the spot!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Enciodes sent it over specially, said it would be given out at the bonfire banquet the night before the ceremony. That uh, what was it called again...?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: 'Karlan Manor's Snow Realm Spring', Sir!
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: They've been talking about it on television every day, enough times that I've memorized it.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Pah, it's all just claptrap for the masses!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I will say that this drink is exquisite. Very robust. I dare say it's the one good thing Enciodes has done.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: However! It hardly holds a candle to our very own aged Paleroche akavit!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Should we keep drinking this stuff, Sir?
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Counting what we got from the Browntails, there's still three other drinks to try.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Of course we'll keep drinking it! If we don't try for ourselves then how will we know which is the best?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Since the Saintess has bestowed the privilege of organizing the banquet on Clan Paleroche, this is of course one of my duties.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Drink is our top priority! I must pick Kjerag's best spirits for this banquet! I cannot let the Saintess down!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Alright, go, get the rest of the booze up here for a taste test!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Yes, Sir!
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Guards, with me! Let's carry up those drinks!
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: General, I have a question.
attributes.name: Guard?

attributes.content: Go ahead.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Although the Patriarch did say that this is all preparation for the ceremony just now, isn't this way too much booze?
attributes.name: Guard?

attributes.content: The boys are totally worn out.
attributes.name: Guard?

attributes.content: You're thinking too much. Completing Kjeragandr's statue is more important than any amount of booze.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Ask the men to bear with it for a while longer. When everything's settled, I'll treat you all to a fine meal.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Alright then.
attributes.name: Guard?

attributes.content: (The Paleroches could stand to be a bit more attentive.)
attributes.name: Guard?

attributes.content: (I didn't think infiltrating them would be this easy.)
attributes.name: Guard?

attributes.content: (Their former patriarch's already brought Rosalind over.)
attributes.name: Guard?

attributes.content: (Next, I need to check what exactly Clan Paleroche has up its sleeve.)
attributes.name: Guard?

attributes.content: (Moreover—All this booze... Based off of Arctosz's attitude, is it really all for the banquet?)
attributes.name: Guard?

attributes.content: (Yet another trail to follow.)
attributes.name: Guard?

attributes.content: What's with all the lollygagging? Come over and help out already.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Yes, sir!
attributes.name: Guard?

attributes.content: (But if the Paleroches truly are keeping some terrible secret, Rosalind must surely be involved as well.)
attributes.name: Guard?

attributes.content: (Finding her has become a priority.)
attributes.name: Guard?

attributes.content: We have arrived.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Is this your house?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: These rooms are pretty big. Are you one of those low-key rich guys? You don't look it.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Hardly. This is merely some family property.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Ahem. Look here, young lady.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: This house is built right into the mountain. When you begin your climb tomorrow, you can use the shortcut behind it.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Got it.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Thanks a lot, batyushka.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I should apologize to you first.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Eh? But why though?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I invited you here out of my own selfish desire.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: By Kjeragandr, I should not have hidden this from you.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Why are you all serious all of a sudden?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I can handle it. Just lay it on me.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Oh, child...
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: There is someone I would like you to meet.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: He...
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Master?!
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: There's a real big guy yelling for you over there, batyushka.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: He your son?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: He's certainly no son of mine.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Give me a moment, young lady.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: What are you doing back, Sir?!
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Am I not allowed back?
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: That's not what I mean!
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: It's just... *sigh* It's not a great time for you to be here...
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Great time or not, you're in no place to speak of such things!
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: How is Arctosz?
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: He... Sir Arctosz, he...
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Out with it already! Speak clearly!
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Yes, sir!
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Sir Arctosz is currently making preparations for the bonfire banquet!
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Don't just give me the good news! What else?!
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: He's personally checking all the drinks for tomorrow. Right now, he's sampling those from the other regions...
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Rotten boy...!
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: He said he would give up drinking last month, and now this? Ridiculous!
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: If he keeps flip-flopping, how is anyone supposed to trust a word out of his mouth?!
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: The patriarch is doing this all for the sake of politics. He's fully dedicated to the Saintess...
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Pfah! Sounds like excuses to me!
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Haha... Oh, by the way. Who's the girl?
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: How rude, Gulo!
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: The young lady is Rosalind, my guest.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Welcome, Madam Rosalind.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: (Master, who is Madam Rosalind really?)
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: (It might just be me, but she looks a bit like Sir Arc—)
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: (Shh!)
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: (I'm not certain of anything yet. Don't ask too many questions just now.)
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Gulo, bring the young lady inside first.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: And then... Wherever that oaf Arctosz is, take her to him.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: And don't forget to tell your minions to prepare a room and meal for her. Treat her well, or else.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Yes, Sir!
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Sorry to keep you waiting.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: No biggie.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: You guys finished chatting?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: What was it you were going to tell me before that big guy came over?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Someone you wanted me to meet, right?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: The man that I wish for you to meet is inside the house.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Follow this one inside first. Your meeting with this man will make everything clear.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: What about you, batyushka? Not coming with?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: We will meet again soon, child.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Very soon...
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Please, come with me, Madam Rosalind.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Alright...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Hey, bratan, your name is Gulo, right?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: What were you chatting with the old man about?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Something you can't tell me?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: C'mon, bratan, say something.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: (*making an X with his fingers*)
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: You really can't say?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: (*yet another X, followed by a constant barrage of Xs*)
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Urgh... Fine, I'll stop bothering you about it.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Anyway, as soon as I meet this guy, I'll know, right? I'm also real curious as to why you two keep staring at my face.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: What, is it 'cause I look like someone, or does someone look like me?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Nah, can't be, the way the old man talked about the guy he wants me to meet, it's like—
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: That—It's not—Well, no...!
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Alright, calm down, a guy like you couldn't lie your way out of a finbowl.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Well, I'm not lying, you guys were stealing some real strange glances earlier.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: If you're up to some funny business, it's gonna come down to my fists.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Weren't we going inside? C'mon already.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Ah! Madam Rosalind!
attributes.name: Gulo
Gulo
attributes.content: Sir Arctosz, Master has brought us a guest...

attributes.name: Gulo
attributes.content: Sir?!
Wahahaha! This is a fine drink, incredibly fine!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Come, finish this glass with me!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Hahaha!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: This is the guy the old man wanted me to meet?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: A... bearded drunk?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Eh?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: What's this girl babbling about?!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I am Arctosz, Patriarch of the Paleroche Clan. How could I possibly get drunk on a sip of wine?!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Hah.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: All the drunks say stuff like that.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: And here I thought... Nah, couldn't be, my papa would definitely be way cooler.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: You're Father's guest, *hic* so I won't argue with you.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Still...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Come a bit closer, girl. Let me have a proper look.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Wha—What the hell are you trying to pull?!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I... I feel like your face is sort of familiar...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: You're...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: *cough*, *cough*...
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: The old man steps inside, disturbing a thick layer of dust.
The door barely hangs on its hinges, and the floor creaks with every step.
Under his orders, the room has not welcomed a single guest in a very, very long time.
With no residents, and no custodians, this forgotten room has fallen apart with age.
Where did I put it?
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: I think it was...
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: ...Ah, good, here it is.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: The old man fiddles with the latch of a cabinet in the corner, removing something from within.
It's a plain, unadorned rock, every edge painstakingly polished smooth until it was perfectly round.
Upon the rock is carved a blessing of Kjeragandr.
The old man grasps the rock in the palm of his hand.
Thank goodness...
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: I kept it, even as I never expected this day to come.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Rosalind has grown up well, Tatyana...
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: The old man remembers. That day was also a winter's day.
It was through this very window that he had watched that sad, silent parting.
He had seen that young, foreign, faultless woman, with her anger and disappointment that could light snow aflame, leave.
He had seen that young, confused child carried in her mother's arms, unable to understand the reason behind her mother's furious face.
He had watched them for what felt like centuries.
Watched them until their backs faded into the bitter white winds.
So many years, and with so much time passed.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: I had planned to give this to Rosalind, but I never expected...
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Arctosz did not want to see you two bear the blame, and so I locked this room, and told him that he must not speak in your stead.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: And then it was I, for the sake of Clan Paleroche, who exiled you and yours.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: If there is anyone to blame, Tatyana, then blame me.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Now, the Paleroche clan is in Arctosz's hands.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Kjerag too, is not as she once was.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: I pledged to live the rest of my days as a simple devotee, so that as long as I lived, I would keep the road ahead clear for Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: If only it had been like this...
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: I must be truly old now, daydreaming like that.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: By Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: By Kjeragandr...
attributes.name: Elder Devotee
